column1: Provincial city (Vietnamese: Thành phố trực thuộc tỉnh)
column3: a type of second tier subdivision of Vietnam is divided into 713 units along with urban district
column5: and town have equal status. Also by virtue of Decree No. 42/2009/ND-CP

column1: Cities are usually provincial urban and administrative centers. Some cities also was appointed provincial economic centers and the culture center of a region (between provinces). There might still agricultural population in the suburban of provincial cities. Provincial cities are divided into wards (within the inner city) and communes (within the suburban). Cities are equal level with counties
column3: but larger and more important. At the time of 2020
